name: TinyRate

allow-half.description: Whether or not to allow half selection

colors.description: icon's color array, which corresponds to the three sections of Threshold
colors.description_zh: icon 的颜色数组，为 Threshold 三个分段所对应的颜色

disabled-void-color.description: The color of the icon is not selected when disabled
disabled-void-color.description_zh: 禁用状态下未选中 icon 的颜色

disabled-void-icon-class.description: The name of the icon style that is unselected in the read-only state
disabled-void-icon-class.description_zh: 只读状态下未选中的图标样式名

:high-threshold.description: The cut-off value for the high and medium scores, and the value itself is divided into the high score
:high-threshold.description_zh: 高分和中等分数的界限值，值本身被划分在高分中

icon-classes.description: The icon style name corresponding to the three sections
icon-classes.description_zh: 三个分段对应的图标样式名

:low-threshold.description: The cut-off values for low and medium scores, and the values themselves are divided into low scores
:low-threshold.description_zh: 低分和中等分数的界限值，值本身被划分在低分中

radio.description: Score other forms of single selection

score-template.description: Score display template, with "{value}" representing the score
score-template.description_zh: 分数显示模板，用“{value}”代表分数

show-score.description: Whether to show the current score, show-score and show-text cannot be true at the same time
show-score.description_zh: 是否显示当前分数，show-score 和 show-text 不能同时为真

show-text.description: Whether or not to display auxiliary text, if true, the text content corresponding to the current score will be selected from the texts array
show-text.description_zh: 是否显示辅助文字，若为真，则会从 texts 数组中选取当前分数对应的文字内容

text-color.description: The color of the secondary text

text-on-bottom.description: Whether to display the corresponding text under the icon
text-on-bottom.description_zh: 是否在图标下显示对应的文字

texts.description: Auxiliary text array, the number of words should be the same as the max property
texts.description_zh: 辅助文字数组，文字的数量应该与max属性一致

void-color.description: The color of the icon is unchecked
void-color.description_zh: 未选中 icon 的颜色

void-icon-class.description: The icon style name for icon is unchecked
void-icon-class.description_zh: 未选中 icon 的图标样式名

events.name: change
events.description: Triggered when the score is changed

description: Rate 快速评级，对评价进行展示。
description_zh: Rate 快速评级，对评价进行展示。
